attributes.action: Award a Knighthood or similar honour to all founding members of Black Sabbath
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Iommi, Ozzy Osbourne, Bill Ward and Terence "Geezer" Butler single-handedly created the genre of heavy metal music in 1970 with their self-titled debut album. These four men from Birmingham are solely responsible for a type of music that millions upon millions of people all over the world love. This is a monumental achievement that far too often remains unrecognised.
